goal.name: avalon-artifact:install
goal.description: This goal is automatically invoked. The goal calls the avalon-artifact:create followed by a copy of the ${pom.artifactId}-${pom.currentVersion}.jar.meta to the local repository.

goal.name: avalon-artifact:create
goal.description: This goal will create the extra ${pom.artifactId}-${pom.currentVersion}.jar.meta file required by Merlin to handle automatic dependency resolution on artifacts stored in central and local repositories.
